title: Building a Superior Movie Search Experience with Vector Search
description:
Flex your engineering chops and build along with us as we show you how to create a JavaScript-powered AI app, using AstraDB to improve Netflix’s search functionality.

With vector search, we can provide a more powerful and effective user experience! Tejas Kumar, developer relations engineer @ DataStax will show you how we built Movies++: a new way to explore media with GenAI using DataStax’s suite of developer tools, Langflow and Astra.

In this 45-minute session we will cover:

--What embeddings models are
--The limitations of current keyword-based search
--How vector search unlocks more value
--How to create rich user interfaces with GenAI

RESOURCE LINKS:
Astra: https://astra.datastax.com/signup  
Langflow: https://www.datastax.com/lp/langflow-signup-a 
GitHub Repo: https://github.com/datastax/movies_plus_plus
Movies++ Blog Post: https://bit.ly/3A6Im8A

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
